MACADAMIA) SEED OIL,* CALOPHYLLUM INOPHYLLUM (TAMANU) SEED OIL,* ARGANIA SPINOSA (ARGAN) KERNEL OIL,* LAVANDULA OFFICINALE (LAVENDER) OIL, ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) OIL, CYMBOPOGON FLEXUOSUS (LEMON GRASS) OIL.
